{"version":1,"tree":{"n":"html","c":[{"n":"head","x":"\n ","l":"\n\n","c":[{"n":"title","x":"Calibre Quick Start Guide","l":"\n "},{"n":"link","l":"\n","a":[["href","../styles/stylesheet.css"],["rel","stylesheet"],["type","text/css"]]}]},{"n":"body","x":"\n\n ","l":"\n\n","c":[{"n":"h1","x":"Where to get help","l":"\n\n ","a":[["class","center"],["id","help"]]},{"n":"p","x":"The first place to look for help is in the ‘Preferences’ dialog. All options have clear descriptions, and there are a lot of options. If you want to change something about calibre there may already be an option for it. It’s also a good idea to familiarize yourself with the preferences because parts of it, such as conversion, are just defaults and will be presented to you at different times for fine-tuning on a per e-book basis.","l":"\n\n "},{"n":"p","x":"The next place to look is the ","l":"\n\n ","c":[{"n":"a","x":"online user manual","l":". Click the ‘Help’ button in the tool bar to have the user manual open in your browser. There is a wealth of information in the user manual including tips and solutions to common problems. It’s also a good idea to check the calibre ","a":[["href","https://manual.calibre-ebook.com"]]},{"n":"a","x":"FAQ","l":" for answers to common questions.","a":[["href","https://manual.calibre-ebook.com/faq.html"]]}]},{"n":"p","x":"Finally, there is the ","l":"\n\n","c":[{"n":"a","x":"calibre forum","l":" on ","a":[["href","https://www.mobileread.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?f=166"]]},{"n":"a","x":"Mobileread","l":" which is the official help forum. There are a number of knowledgeable users who answer questions. Also, Kovid and myself actively participate in helping new and veteran users. If you have a question or need help this is the best place to go. If you’ve found a bug or would like to request a new feature it’s okay to ask about it on the forum but it’s also a good idea to submit it to the projects ","a":[["href","https://www.mobileread.com/"]]},{"n":"a","x":"bug/issue tracking system","l":". Forum posts tend to get lost over time while the tracking system makes it easy to see what needs fixing or worked on.","a":[["href","https://bugs.launchpad.net/calibre"]]}]}]}]},"ns_map":["http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"]}
